channel.title: Toggle Buttons and Changing Labels
channel.description:
So I have a series of toggle buttons that represent 1 of 6 objects the user can select for their "team", and I want to have the team represented on the frame somehow (I currently have labels). Is there a simpler, shorter, cleaner way to have the buttons change what the labels say than just writing it out in a billion if statements?
Let me know if I need to provide further clarification as to what my intentions are.

item.title: Toggle Buttons and Changing Labels
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

They all have relatively the same action, whatever you click gets added to your team, and the labels should update. I know I can write it using a ton of if statements, but that’s something I want to avoid if possible. I also want the labels to update dynamically(is this even the word I’m looking for?)

I’ll try and diagram it out here:

buttonA    buttonB    buttonC    buttonD

TeamSlot1Label    TeamSlot2Label    TeamSlot3Label
buttonA(selected)    buttonB    buttonC(selected)    buttonD

A   C    TeamSlot3Label

And if I press B, putting it in slot 3, then deselect 2, I’d preferably like to have B move to slot 2.
